page.title: 03Education
page.content: Our school{Ysgol Gymraeg Tyderwen}was founded in{1948.}It was the third {Welsh}medium school in Wales the first being in{Aberystwyth}and second in {Llanelli.}It was the first of its kind in{Glamorgan.}A father of a present school pupil, and one of the present teachers were members of the very first class. They are Royston Thomas and Mrs.Jones. There were 5 children present on the first day but the numbers grew substantially during the first year. Now the number of children in this school has grown to 226.Out of the 226 children only 39 have a parent who speaks Welsh.Children travel from many parts of Maesteg to attend the school, namely{Cwmfelin, Llangynwyd, {Garth, Nantyffyllon}and{Caerau.}The furthest pupil Mathew Bevan lives in {Coetre Hen.}
